prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Drums, Bass, Piano, Guitar, Reed, but without Brass.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Drums, Bass, Piano, Guitar, and Reed, but no Brass.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Drums, Bass, Piano, Guitar, and Reed, but no Brass instruments.

Style 3:
This composition is made up of Drums, Bass, Piano, Guitar, and Reed, excluding Brass.
